select (select desp from geocode g where g.code = geocode) desp, (select decode(substr(code, 5, 2), '00', 0, g.dis_order) from geocode g where g.code = geocode) dis_order, sum(chaobz) as chaobz, sum(chaozs) as chaozs, sum(chaojg) as chaojg from (select g.code as geocode, desp as desp, nvl(j.jgsy_chaobz, 0) as chaobz, nvl(j.jgsy_chaozs, 0) as chaozs, nvl(j.jgsy_chaojg, 0) as chaojg
from geocode g left join jgsy_common j on g.code = j.dep_code and j.jgsy_states = '1' where g.code like #{depcode} AND g.code != #{code}) group by geocode

select jgsy_name, jgsy_type, dep_name
, chaobz problem_num
, chaozs problem_num
, chaojg problem_num
from (select jgsy_code, jgsy_name, (select g.desp from geocode g where g.code = geocode) as dep_name, decode(jgtype, 'local', '主管部门', 'sy', '事业单位', 'lo_next', '下设机构', '街道乡镇') as jgsy_type, (synsjgs - pznsjgs) as chaojg, (case when jgtype = 'sy' then (qebk_zz + cebt_zz + jfzl_zz + ga_zz + jcy_zz + fy_zz + sf_zz + aq_zz) - (qebk_bz + cebt_bz + jfzl_bz + ga_bz + jcy_bz + fy_bz + sf_bz + aq_bz) else (qebk_zz + cebt_zz + jfzl_zz + dzq_zz + ga_zz + jcy_zz + fy_zz + sf_zz + aq_zz) - (qebk_bz + cebt_bz + jfzl_bz + dzq_bz + ga_bz + jcy_bz + fy_bz + sf_bz + aq_bz) end) chaobz, (l_r_l1_nu - l_a_l1_nu) as chaozs from v_bzzz) where jgsy_code like #{depCode}
and chaobz > 0
and chaozs > 0
and chaojg > 0
order by jgsy_code
